entry.em: ..WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM CDT TUESDAY

entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
BREEZY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 20 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 45 MPH

A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS
VERY WINDY WITH LOWS AROUND 50
SOUTHEAST WINDS 25 TO 35 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 50 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 60
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE MID 30S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
LOWS AROUND 40

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
